Chapter Previous Next

class gstLineSegment : public gstLineBase

Implements an line segment in space defined by two endpoints, p1 and p2.

From header file: gstLineSegment.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstLineSegment
gstLineSegmentLine passes through p2.
gstLineSegmentConstructor defines line segment from p1 to p2.
gstLineSegmentConstructor defines line segment starting at p1 directed along v1 and ending at p1+v1.
~gstLineSegment
Functions
eval Gives the parametric value t of the line segment for the projection of pt onto the line segment.
getEndPoint Returns p2.
getStartPoint Returns p1.
length Returns length of line segment.
origin Returns p1.
projectToParametric Projects pt onto the line segment and returns the parametric value of the projection.
setEndPoint Sets p2 = endPoint.
setStartPoint Sets p1 = startPoint.
Virtual Functions
directionGstVector directed along line in the direction of v1 or toward p2 depending on constructor used.
evalEvaluates parametric form of line segment at t and returns point at f(t).
getPointOnLineReturns a point on the line.
unitDirectionGstVector directed along line in the direction of v1 or toward p2 depending on constructor used.
